name: Sanity Studio Builder
description:
Sanity Studio is an open-source CMS built with React.js. It offers rapid configuration and free form customisation.


This Figma kit has been created to:

  • Visually prototype your Sanity schemas
  • Quickly prototype configurations of Sanity Studio
  • Design customisations such as themes, custom styles, plugins and custom input components


This library is created on top of Sanity UI, our UI library available as:

  • React library
  • Figma library


Built with ❤️ at Sanity.io
